attributes.action: Legalisation of electric scooters for all
attributes.additional_details:
1. Its better for the enviroment 
2. They're cheap to run 
3. They are no different to a mobility scooter
4. As a women it make me feel safer to go out at night on one, to walk the dog ect
attributes.background: Make electric scooters legal to ride for everyone

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553756
